monster.name: Sidekick: Warrior (Attacker) 01
monster.languages: Common, plus one of your choice

trait.name: Martial Role: Attacker
trait.text: The warrior gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls.

action.name: Longsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 2 slashing damage.

action.name: Longbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.

monster.name: Sidekick: Warrior (Defender) 01
monster.languages: Common, plus one of your choice

action.name: Longsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 2 slashing damage.

action.name: Longbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Protection
reaction.text: The warrior imposes disadvantage on the attack roll of a creature within 5 feet of it whose target isn’t the warrior. The warrior must be able to see the attacker.

monster.name: Sidekick: Warrior (Attacker) 02
monster.languages: Common, plus one of your choice

trait.name: Second Wind

trait.text: The expert can take the Help action as a bonus action.

trait.name: Evasion
trait.text: When the expert is not incapacitated and subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it failed.

trait.name: Extra Attack
trait.text: The expert can attack twice, instead of once, whenever it takes the Attack action on its turn.

trait.name: Helpful
trait.text: The expert can take the Help action as a bonus action, and the creature who receives the help gains a 1d6 bonus to the d20 roll. monster.name: Sidekick: Ruby Hammerwhacker (Attacker) 01
monster.languages: Common, Dwarvish

trait.name: Martial Role: Attacker
trait.text: Ruby gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls.

trait.name: Darkvision
trait.text: Accustomed to life underground, Ruby have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. She can see in dim light within 60 feet of her as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. She can’t discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

trait.name: Dwarven Resilience
trait.text: Ruby has advantage on saving throws against poison and resistance to poison damage

action.name: Longsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 3 slashing damage.

action.name: Longbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.

monster.name: Sidekick: Ruby Hammerwhacker (Defender) 01
monster.languages: Common, Dwarvish

trait.name: Darkvision
trait.text: Accustomed to life underground, Ruby have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. She can see in dim light within 60 feet of her as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. She can’t discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

trait.name: Dwarven Resilience
trait.text: Ruby has advantage on saving throws against poison and resistance to poison damage

action.name: Longsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 3 slashing damage.

action.name: Longbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Protection
reaction.text: Ruby imposes disadvantage on the attack roll of a creature within 5 feet of her whose target isn’t Ruby. Ruby must be able to see the attacker.

monster.name: Sidekick: Ruby Hammerwhacker (Attacker) 02
monster.languages: Common, Dwarvish

trait.name: Second Wind
trait.text: Ruby can use a bonus action on her turn to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + her level. If she does so, she can’t use this feature again until she finishes a short or long rest.

trait.text: Ruby can use a bonus action on her turn to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + her level. If she does so, she can’t use this feature again until she finishes a short or long rest.

trait.name: Martial Role: Attacker
trait.text: Ruby gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls.

trait.name: Darkvision
trait.text: Accustomed to life underground, Ruby have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. She can see in dim light within 60 feet of her as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. She can’t discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

trait.text: Ruby has advantage on saving throws against poison and resistance to poison damage

action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, or 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

monster.name: Sidekick: Inverna Nightbreeze (Attacker) 01
monster.languages: Common, Elvish, plus one of your choice

trait.name: Martial Role: Attacker
trait.text: Inverna gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls.

trait.name: Darkvision
trait.text: Accustomed to twilit forests and the night sky, Inverna have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. She can see in dim light within 60 feet of her as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. She can’t discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
trait.text: Inverna has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put her to sleep

trait.name: Trance
trait.text: Elves don't need to sleep. Instead,they meditate deeply, remaining semiconscious, for 4 hours a day. (The Common word for such meditation is "trance.") While meditating, Inverna can dream after a fashion; such dreams are actually mental exercises that have become reflexive through years of practice. After resting in this way, she gains the same benefit that a human does from 8 hours of sleep.

action.name: Longsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 2 slashing damage.

action.name: Longbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

monster.name: Sidekick: Inverna Nightbreeze (Defender) 01
monster.languages: Common, Elvish, plus one of your choice

trait.text: Accustomed to twilit forests and the night sky, Inverna have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. She can see in dim light within 60 feet of her as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. She can’t discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

action.name: Longbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Protection
reaction.text: Inverna imposes disadvantage on the attack roll of a creature within 5 feet of her whose target isn’t Inverna. Inverna must be able to see the attacker.

monster.name: Sidekick: Inverna Nightbreeze (Attacker) 02
monster.languages: Common, Elvish, plus one of your choice

trait.name: Second Wind
trait.text: Inverna can use a bonus action on her turn to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + her level. If she does so, she can’t use this feature again until she finishes a short or long rest.

monster.name: Sidekick: Inverna Nightbreeze (Attacker) 06
monster.languages: Common, Elvish, plus one of your choice

trait.name: Extra Attack
trait.text: Inverna can attack twice, instead of once, whenever she takes the Attack action on her turn.

trait.name: Improved Critical
trait.text: Inverna’s attack rolls now score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 on the d20.

trait.name: Second Wind
trait.text: Inverna can use a bonus action on her turn to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + her level. If she does so, she can’t use this feature again until she finishes a short or long rest.

trait.name: Martial Role: Attacker
trait.text: Inverna gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls.

trait.name: Darkvision
trait.text: Accustomed to twilit forests and the night sky, Inverna have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. She can see in dim light within 60 feet of her as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. She can’t discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
trait.text: Inverna has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put her to sleep

trait.name: Trance
trait.text: Elves don't need to sleep. Instead,they meditate deeply, remaining semiconscious, for 4 hours a day. (The Common word for such meditation is "trance.") While meditating, Inverna can dream after a fashion; such dreams are actually mental exercises that have become reflexive through years of practice. After resting in this way, she gains the same benefit that a human does from 8 hours of sleep.

action.name: Longsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 3 slashing damage.

action.name: Longbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

trait.text: Inverna has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put her to sleep

trait.name: Trance
trait.text: Elves don't need to sleep. Instead,they meditate deeply, remaining semiconscious, for 4 hours a day. (The Common word for such meditation is "trance.") While meditating, Inverna can dream after a fashion; such dreams are actually mental exercises that have become reflexive through years of practice. After resting in this way, she gains the same benefit that a human does from 8 hours of sleep.

action.name: Longsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 5 slashing damage.

action.name: Longbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Protection
reaction.text: Inverna imposes disadvantage on the attack roll of a creature within 5 feet of her whose target isn’t Inverna. Inverna must be able to see the attacker.

monster.name: Sidekick: Quinn Hightopple (Attacker) 01
monster.languages: Common, Halfling

trait.name: Martial Role: Attacker
trait.text: Quinn gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls.

trait.name: Lucky
trait.text: When Quinn rolls a 1 on an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, he can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

trait.name: Brave
trait.text: Quinn have advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

trait.name: Halfling Nimbleness
trait.text: Quinn can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than his.

trait.name: Naturally Stealthy
trait.text: Quinn can attempt to hide even when he is obscured only by a creature that is at least one size larger than him.

trait.text: Quinn can use a bonus action on his turn to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + his level. If he does so, he can’t use this feature again until he finishes a short or long rest.

trait.name: Martial Role: Attacker
trait.text: Quinn gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls.

trait.name: Lucky
trait.text: When Quinn rolls a 1 on an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, he can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

trait.name: Brave
trait.text: Quinn have advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

trait.name: Halfling Nimbleness
trait.text: Quinn can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than his.

trait.name: Naturally Stealthy
trait.text: Quinn can attempt to hide even when he is obscured only by a creature that is at least one size larger than him.

action.name: Longsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 4 slashing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

trait.name: Evasion
trait.text: When the expert is not incapacitated and subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it failed.

trait.name: Extra Attack
trait.text: The expert can attack twice, instead of once, whenever it takes the Attack action on its turn.

trait.name: Helpful
trait.text: The expert can take the Help action as a bonus action, and the creature who receives the help gains a 1d6 bonus to the d20 roll. If that roll is an attack roll, the creature can forgo adding the bonus to it, and then if the attack hits, the creature can add the bonus to the attack’s damage roll against one target.

trait.name: Evasion
trait.text: When Pete is not incapacitated and subjected to an effect that allows him to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, he instead takes no damage if he succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if he failed.

trait.name: Extra Attack
trait.text: Pete can attack twice, instead of once, whenever it takes the Attack action on his turn.

trait.name: Helpful
trait.text: Pete can take the Help action as a bonus action, and the creature who receives the help gains a 1d6 bonus to the d20 roll. If that roll is an attack roll, the creature can forgo adding the bonus to it, and then if the attack hits, the creature can add the bonus to the attack’s damage roll against one target.

If that roll is an attack roll, the creature can forgo adding the bonus to it, and then if the attack hits, the creature can add the bonus to the attack’s damage roll against one target.

trait.name: Tools
trait.text: Talon has thieves’ tools and a musical instrument.

trait.name: Cunning Action
trait.text: On Talon’s turn in combat, he can take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action as a bonus action.

action.name: Shortsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

action.name: Dagger
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

monster.name: Sidekick: Talon Thornwild 10
monster.skill: Acrobatics +13, Performance +6, Persuasion +6, Sleight of Hand +9, Stealth +13
monster.languages: Common, plus one of your choice

trait.name: Evasion
trait.text: When Talon is not incapacitated and subjected to an effect that allows him to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, he instead takes no damage if he succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if he failed.

trait.name: Extra Attack
trait.text: Talon can attack twice, instead of once, whenever it takes the Attack action on his turn.

trait.name: Helpful
trait.text: Talon can take the Help action as a bonus action, and the creature who receives the help gains a 1d6 bonus to the d20 roll. monster.name: Sidekick: Nib Addlespur (Mage) 01
monster.languages: Common, Halfling

trait.name: Lucky
trait.text: When Nib rolls a 1 on an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, she can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

trait.name: Brave
trait.text: Nib have advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

trait.name: Halfling Nimbleness
trait.text: Nib can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than her.

trait.name: Naturally Stealthy
trait.text: Nib can attempt to hide even when she is obscured only by a creature that is at least one size larger than her.

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text: Nib’s spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). Nib has following wizard spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light
1st level (2 slots): sleep

monster.spells: Fire Bolt, Light, Sleep

action.name: Quarterstaff
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, or 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

monster.name: Sidekick: Nib Addlespur (Healer) 04
monster.languages: Common, Halfling

trait.name: Lucky
trait.text: When Nib rolls a 1 on an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, she can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

trait.name: Brave
trait.text: Nib have advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

trait.name: Halfling Nimbleness
trait.text: Nib can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than her.

trait.name: Naturally Stealthy
trait.text: Nib can attempt to hide even when she is obscured only by a creature that is at least one size larger than her.

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text: Nib’s spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). Nib has following cleric spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): guidance, sacred flame, resistance
1st level (3 slots): cure wounds, bless, shield of faith

monster.spells: Guidance, Sacred Flame, Cure Wounds, Bless, Shield of Faith, Resistance

action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, or 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

monster.name: Sidekick: Warrior (Attacker) 13
monster.languages: Common, plus one of your choice

trait.name: Improved Defense
trait.text: The warrior’s AC increases by 1.

trait.name: Indomitable (2/Day)
trait.text: The warrior can reroll a saving throw that it fails but must use the new result.

trait.name: Battle Readiness
trait.text: The warrior has advantage on initiative rolls.

trait.name: Extra Attack
trait.text: The warrior can attack three times, instead of once, whenever it takes the attack action on its turn.

trait.name: Improved Critical
trait.text: The warrior’s attack rolls now score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 on the d20.

trait.name: Second Wind
trait.text: The warrior can use a bonus action on its turn to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + its level. If it does so, it can’t use this feature again until it finishes a short or long rest.

trait.name: Martial Role: Attacker
trait.text: The warrior gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls.

action.name: Longsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 5 slashing damage.

action.name: Longbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Longsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 5 slashing damage.

action.name: Longbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) piercing damage.

monster.name: Sidekick: Warrior (Defender) 19
monster.languages: Common, plus one of your choice

trait.name: Unstoppable Force
trait.text: If the warrior's total for a strength check is less than the warrior's strength score, the score can be used in place of the total.

trait.name: Improved Defense
trait.text: The warrior’s AC increases by 1.

trait.name: Indomitable (3/Day)
trait.text: The warrior can reroll a saving throw that it fails but must use the new result.

trait.name: Battle Readiness
trait.text: The warrior has advantage on initiative rolls.

trait.name: Extra Attack
trait.text: The warrior can attack three times, instead of once, whenever it takes the attack action on its turn.

trait.name: Superior Critical
trait.text: The warrior’s attack rolls now score a critical hit on a roll of 18-20 on the d20.

trait.name: Second Wind (2 uses)
trait.text: The warrior can use a bonus action on its turn to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + its level. It can use this feature twice before needing to finish a short or long rest.

action.name: Longsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 5 slashing damage.

action.name: Longbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Protection
reaction.text: The warrior imposes disadvantage on the attack roll of a creature within 5 feet of it whose target isn’t the warrior. The warrior must be able to see the attacker.

monster.name: Sidekick: Expert 13
monster.skill: Acrobatics +16, Performance +8, Persuasion +8, Sleight of Hand +10, Stealth +15
monster.languages: Common, plus one of your choice

trait.name: Reliable Talent
trait.text: Whenever the expert makes an ability check that includes its whole proficiency bonus, it can treat a d20 roll of 9 or lower as a 10.

trait.name: Evasion
trait.text: When the expert is not incapacitated and subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it failed.

trait.name: Extra Attack
trait.text: The expert can attack twice, instead of once, whenever it takes the Attack action on its turn.

trait.name: Helpful
trait.text: The expert can take the Help action as a bonus action, and the creature who receives the help gains a 1d6 bonus to the d20 roll. If that roll is an attack roll, the creature can forgo adding the bonus to it, and then if the attack hits, the creature can add the bonus to the attack’s damage roll against one target.

trait.name: Tools
trait.text: The expert has thieves’ tools and a musical instrument.

trait.name: Cunning Action
trait.text: On the expert’s turn in combat, it can take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action as a bonus action.

action.name: Shortsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage.

action.name: Dagger
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d4 + 5) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage.

trait.name: Stroke of Luck
trait.text: The expert has an uncanny knack for succeeding when they need to. If their attack misses a target within range, they can turn the miss into a hit. Alternatively, if they fail an ability check, they can treat the d20 roll as a 20.
The expert can use this ability once per day.

monster.name: Sidekick: Spellcaster (Mage) 13
monster.languages: Common, plus one of your choice

trait.name: Empowered Spells
trait.text: Choose one school of magic. Whenever the spellcaster casts a spell of that school by expending a spell slot, the spellcaster can add its spellcasting ability modifier to the spell’s damage roll or healing roll, if any.

trait.name: Potent Cantrips
trait.text: The spellcaster can add its spellcasting ability modifier to the damage it deals with any cantrip.

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text: The spellcaster’s spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 18, +10 to hit with spell attacks). The spellcaster has following wizard spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, mage hand, minor illusion, shocking grasp
1st level (4 slots): sleep, burning hands, shield
2nd level (3 slots): invisibility, flaming sphere
3rd level (3 slots): fireball, fly
4th level (3 slots): wall of fire, polymorph
5th level (2 slots): cone of cold, hold monster
6th level (1 slot): chain lightning
7th level (1 slot): delayed blast fireball

monster.spells: Fire Bolt, Light, Sleep, Burning Hands, Shield, Mage Hand, Invisibility, Minor Illusion, Flaming Sphere, Fireball, Fly, Wall of Fire, Polymorph, Cone of Cold, Shocking Grasp, Hold Monster, Chain Lightning, Delayed Blast Fireball

action.name: Quarterstaff
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, or 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

monster.name: Sidekick: Spellcaster (Mage) 14
monster.languages: Common, plus one of your choice

trait.name: Overchannel
trait.text: The spellcaster can increase the power of their simpler spells. When the spellcaster casts a spell of 5th level or lower that deals damage or heals, the spellcaster can deal maximum damage/healing with that spell once per day.

action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, or 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

monster.name: Sidekick: Spellcaster (Mage) 17
monster.languages: Common, plus one of your choice

trait.name: Overchannel
trait.text: The spellcaster can increase the power of their simpler spells. When the spellcaster casts a spell of 5th level or lower that deals damage or heals, the spellcaster can deal maximum damage/healing with that spell once per day.

trait.name: Empowered Spells
trait.text: Choose one school of magic. Whenever the spellcaster casts a spell of that school by expending a spell slot, the spellcaster can add its spellcasting ability modifier to the spell’s damage roll or healing roll, if any.

trait.name: Potent Cantrips
trait.text: The spellcaster can add its spellcasting ability modifier to the damage it deals with any cantrip.

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text: The spellcaster’s spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 19, +11 to hit with spell attacks). The spellcaster has following wizard spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, mage hand, minor illusion, shocking grasp
1st level (4 slots): sleep, burning hands, shield
2nd level (3 slots): invisibility, flaming sphere
3rd level (3 slots): fireball, fly
4th level (3 slots): wall of fire, polymorph
5th level (2 slots): cone of cold, hold monster, telekinesis
6th level (1 slot): chain lightning, circle of death
7th level (1 slot): delayed blast fireball
8th level (1 slot): incendiary cloud
9th level (1 slot): meteor swarm

trait.name: Spellcasting

Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, mage hand, minor illusion, shocking grasp
1st level (4 slots): sleep, burning hands, shield
2nd level (3 slots): invisibility, flaming sphere
3rd level (3 slots): fireball, fly

action.name: Quarterstaff
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, or 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

monster.name: Sidekick: Ruby Hammerwhacker (Attacker) 13
monster.languages: Common, Dwarvish

trait.name: Improved Defense
trait.text: Ruby’s AC increases by 1.

trait.name: Indomitable (2/Day)
trait.text: Ruby can reroll a saving throw that she fails but must use the new result.

trait.name: Battle Readiness
trait.text: Ruby has advantage on initiative rolls.

trait.name: Extra Attack
trait.text: Ruby can attack three times, instead of once, whenever she takes the attack action on her turn.

trait.name: Improved Critical
trait.text: Ruby’s attack rolls now score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 on the d20.

trait.name: Second Wind
trait.text: Ruby can use a bonus action on her turn to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + her level. If she does so, she can’t use this feature again until she finishes a short or long rest.

trait.name: Martial Role: Attacker
trait.text: Ruby gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls.

trait.name: Darkvision
trait.text: Accustomed to life underground, Ruby have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. She can see in dim light within 60 feet of her as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. She can’t discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

trait.name: Dwarven Resilience
trait.text: Ruby has advantage on saving throws against poison and resistance to poison damage

action.name: Longsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 5 slashing damage.

action.name: Longbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Longsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 5 slashing damage.

action.name: Longbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Protection
reaction.text: Ruby imposes disadvantage on the attack roll of a creature within 5 feet of her whose target isn’t Ruby. Ruby must be able to see the attacker.

monster.name: Sidekick: Ruby Hammerwhacker (Attacker) 14
monster.languages: Common, Dwarvish

trait.name: Improved Defense
trait.text: Ruby’s AC increases by 1.

trait.name: Indomitable (2/Day)
trait.text: Ruby can reroll a saving throw that she fails but must use the new result.

trait.name: Battle Readiness
trait.text: Ruby has advantage on initiative rolls.

trait.name: Extra Attack
trait.text: Ruby can attack three times, instead of once, whenever she takes the attack action on her turn.

trait.name: Improved Critical
trait.text: Ruby’s attack rolls now score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 on the d20.

trait.name: Second Wind
trait.text: Ruby can use a bonus action on her turn to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + her level. If she does so, she can’t use this feature again until she finishes a short or long rest.

trait.name: Martial Role: Attacker
trait.text: Ruby gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls.

trait.name: Darkvision
trait.text: Accustomed to life underground, Ruby have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. She can see in dim light within 60 feet of her as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. She can’t discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

trait.name: Dwarven Resilience
trait.text: Ruby has advantage on saving throws against poison and resistance to poison damage

action.name: Longsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 5 slashing damage.

action.name: Longbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

monster.name: Sidekick: Ruby Hammerwhacker (Defender) 14

monster.name: Sidekick: Donnabella Fiasco (Healer) 13
monster.languages: Common, plus one of your choice

trait.name: Empowered Spells
trait.text: Choose one school of magic. Whenever Donnabella casts a spell of that school by expending a spell slot, she can add her spellcasting ability modifier to the spell’s damage roll or healing roll, if any.

trait.name: Potent Cantrips
trait.text: Donnabella can add her spellcasting ability modifier to the damage she deals with any cantrip.

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text: Donnabella’s spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 18, +10 to hit with spell attacks). She has following cleric spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): guidance, sacred flame, resistance, light, spare the dying
1st level (4 slots): cure wounds, bless, shield of faith
2nd level (3 slots): aid, lesser restoration
3rd level (3 slots): protection from energy, revivify
4th level (3 slots): death ward, banishment
5th level (2 slots): greater restoration, mass cure wounds
6th level (1 slot): heal
7th level (1 slot): regenerate

monster.spells: Guidance, Sacred Flame, Cure Wounds, Bless, Shield of Faith, Resistance, Aid, Light, Lesser Restoration, Protection from Energy, Revivify, Death Ward, Banishment, Greater Restoration, Spare the Dying, Mass Cure Wounds, Heal, Regenerate

action.name: Quarterstaff
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, or 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

monster.name: Sidekick: Donnabella Fiasco (Healer) 14
monster.languages: Common, plus one of your choice

trait.name: Overchannel
trait.text: Donnabella can increase the power of their simpler spells. When she casts a spell of 5th level or lower that deals damage or heals, she can deal maximum damage/healing with that spell once per day.

trait.name: Empowered Spells
trait.text: Choose one school of magic. Whenever Donnabella casts a spell of that school by expending a spell slot, she can add her spellcasting ability modifier to the spell’s damage roll or healing roll, if any.

trait.name: Potent Cantrips
trait.text: Donnabella can add her spellcasting ability modifier to the damage she deals with any cantrip.

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text: Donnabella’s spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 18, +10 to hit with spell attacks). She has following cleric spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): guidance, sacred flame, resistance, light, spare the dying
1st level (4 slots): cure wounds, bless, shield of faith
2nd level (3 slots): aid, lesser restoration
3rd level (3 slots): protection from energy, revivify
4th level (3 slots): death ward, banishment
5th level (2 slots): greater restoration, mass cure wounds, dispel evil and good
6th level (1 slot): heal
7th level (1 slot): regenerate

monster.spells: Guidance, Sacred Flame, Cure Wounds, Bless, Shield of Faith, Resistance, Aid, Light, Lesser Restoration, Protection from Energy, Revivify, Death Ward, Banishment, Greater Restoration, Spare the Dying, Mass Cure Wounds, Heal, Regenerate, Dispel Evil and Good

action.name: Quarterstaff
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, or 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

monster.name: Sidekick: Donnabella Fiasco (Healer) 15
monster.languages: Common, plus one of your choice

trait.name: Overchannel
trait.text: Donnabella can increase the power of their simpler spells. When she casts a spell of 5th level or lower that deals damage or heals, she can deal maximum damage/healing with that spell once per day.

trait.name: Empowered Spells
trait.text: Choose one school of magic. Whenever Donnabella casts a spell of that school by expending a spell slot, she can add her spellcasting ability modifier to the spell’s damage roll or healing roll, if any.

trait.name: Potent Cantrips
trait.text: Donnabella can add her spellcasting ability modifier to the damage she deals with any cantrip.

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text: Donnabella’s spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 18, +10 to hit with spell attacks). She has following cleric spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): guidance, sacred flame, resistance, light, spare the dying
1st level (4 slots): cure wounds, bless, shield of faith
2nd level (3 slots): aid, lesser restoration
3rd level (3 slots): protection from energy, revivify
4th level (3 slots): death ward, banishment
5th level (2 slots): greater restoration, mass cure wounds, dispel evil and good
6th level (1 slot): heal
7th level (1 slot): regenerate
8th level (1 slot): holy aura

monster.spells: Fire Bolt, Light, Sleep, Burning Hands, Shield, Mage Hand, Invisibility, Minor Illusion, Flaming Sphere, Fireball, Fly, Wall of Fire, Polymorph, Cone of Cold, Shocking Grasp, Hold Monster, Chain Lightning, Delayed Blast Fireball, Telekinesis, Incendiary Cloud, Circle of Death, Meteor Swarm, Finger of Death, Dominate Monster, Power Word Kill

action.name: Quarterstaff
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, or 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

monster.name: Sidekick: Inverna Nightbreeze (Attacker) 13
monster.languages: Common, Elvish, plus one of your choice

trait.name: Improved Defense
trait.text: Inverna’s AC increases by 1.

trait.name: Indomitable (2/Day)
trait.text: Inverna can reroll a saving throw that she fails but must use the new result.

trait.name: Battle Readiness
trait.text: Inverna has advantage on initiative rolls.

trait.name: Extra Attack
trait.text: Inverna can attack three times, instead of once, whenever she takes the attack action on her turn.

trait.name: Improved Critical
trait.text: Inverna’s attack rolls now score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 on the d20.

trait.name: Second Wind
trait.text: Inverna can use a bonus action on her turn to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + her level. If she does so, she can’t use this feature again until she finishes a short or long rest.

trait.name: Martial Role: Attacker
trait.text: Inverna gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls.

trait.name: Darkvision
trait.text: Accustomed to twilit forests and the night sky, Inverna have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. She can see in dim light within 60 feet of her as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. She can’t discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
trait.text: Inverna has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put her to sleep

trait.name: Trance
trait.text: Elves don't need to sleep. Instead,they meditate deeply, remaining semiconscious, for 4 hours a day. (The Common word for such meditation is "trance.") While meditating, Inverna can dream after a fashion; such dreams are actually mental exercises that have become reflexive through years of practice. After resting in this way, she gains the same benefit that a human does from 8 hours of sleep.

action.name: Longsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 5 slashing damage.

action.name: Longbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

monster.name: Sidekick: Inverna Nightbreeze (Defender) 13

action.name: Longsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 5 slashing damage.

action.name: Longbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Protection
reaction.text: Inverna imposes disadvantage on the attack roll of a creature within 5 feet of her whose target isn’t Inverna. Inverna must be able to see the attacker.

trait.name: Second Wind (2 uses)
trait.text: Inverna can use a bonus action on her turn to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + her level. she can use this feature twice before needing to finish a short or long rest.

trait.name: Martial Role: Attacker
trait.text: Inverna gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls.

trait.name: Darkvision
trait.text: Accustomed to twilit forests and the night sky, Inverna have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. She can see in dim light within 60 feet of her as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. She can’t discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
trait.text: Inverna has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put her to sleep

trait.name: Trance
trait.text: Elves don't need to sleep. Instead,they meditate deeply, remaining semiconscious, for 4 hours a day. (The Common word for such meditation is "trance.") While meditating, Inverna can dream after a fashion; such dreams are actually mental exercises that have become reflexive through years of practice. After resting in this way, she gains the same benefit that a human does from 8 hours of sleep.

action.name: Longsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 5 slashing damage.

action.name: Longbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) piercing damage.

monster.name: Sidekick: Inverna Nightbreeze (Defender) 19
monster.languages: Common, Elvish, plus one of your choice

trait.name: Unstoppable Force
trait.text: If Inverna's total for a strength check is less than Inverna's strength score, the score can be used in place of the total.

trait.name: Improved Defense
trait.text: Inverna’s AC increases by 1.

trait.name: Indomitable (3/Day)
trait.text: Inverna can reroll a saving throw that she fails but must use the new result.

trait.name: Battle Readiness
trait.text: Inverna has advantage on initiative rolls.

trait.name: Extra Attack
trait.text: Inverna can attack three times, instead of once, whenever she takes the attack action on her turn.

trait.name: Superior Critical
trait.text: Inverna’s attack rolls now score a critical hit on a roll of 18-20 on the d20.

trait.name: Second Wind (2 uses)
trait.text: Inverna can use a bonus action on her turn to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + her level. she can use this feature twice before needing to finish a short or long rest.

trait.name: Trance

While meditating, Inverna can dream after a fashion; such dreams are actually mental exercises that have become reflexive through years of practice. After resting in this way, she gains the same benefit that a human does from 8 hours of sleep.

action.name: Longsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 5 slashing damage.

action.name: Longbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Protection
reaction.text: Inverna imposes disadvantage on the attack roll of a creature within 5 feet of her whose target isn’t Inverna. Inverna must be able to see the attacker.

monster.name: Sidekick: Quinn Hightopple (Attacker) 13
monster.languages: Common, Halfling

trait.name: Improved Defense
trait.text: Quinn’s AC increases by 1.

trait.name: Indomitable (2/Day)
trait.text: Quinn can reroll a saving throw that he fails but must use the new result.

trait.name: Battle Readiness
trait.text: Quinn has advantage on initiative rolls.

trait.name: Extra Attack
trait.text: Quinn can attack three times, instead of once, whenever he takes the attack action on his turn.

trait.name: Improved Critical
trait.text: Quinn’s attack rolls now score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 on the d20.

trait.name: Second Wind
trait.text: Quinn can use a bonus action on his turn to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + his level. If he does so, he can’t use this feature again until he finishes a short or long rest.

trait.name: Martial Role: Attacker
trait.text: Quinn gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls.

trait.name: Lucky
trait.text: When Quinn rolls a 1 on an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, he can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

trait.name: Brave
trait.text: Quinn have advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

trait.name: Halfling Nimbleness
trait.text: Quinn can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than his.

trait.name: Naturally Stealthy
trait.text: Quinn can attempt to hide even when he is obscured only by a creature that is at least one size larger than him.

trait.text: When Quinn rolls a 1 on an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, he can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

trait.name: Brave
trait.text: Quinn have advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

trait.name: Halfling Nimbleness
trait.text: Quinn can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than his.

trait.name: Naturally Stealthy
trait.text: Quinn can attempt to hide even when he is obscured only by a creature that is at least one size larger than him.

action.name: Longsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 5 slashing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage.

monster.name: Sidekick: Quinn Hightopple (Defender) 18
monster.languages: Common, Halfling

trait.name: Unstoppable Force
trait.text: If Quinn's total for a strength check is less than Quinn's strength score, the score can be used in place of the total.

trait.name: Improved Defense
trait.text: Quinn’s AC increases by 1.

trait.name: Indomitable (3/Day)
trait.text: Quinn can reroll a saving throw that he fails but must use the new result.

trait.name: Battle Readiness
trait.text: Quinn has advantage on initiative rolls.

trait.name: Extra Attack
trait.text: Quinn can attack three times, instead of once, whenever he takes the attack action on his turn.

trait.name: Superior Critical
trait.text: Quinn’s attack rolls now score a critical hit on a roll of 18-20 on the d20.

trait.name: Second Wind (2 uses)
trait.text: Quinn can use a bonus action on his turn to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + his level. he can use this feature twice before needing to finish a short or long rest.

trait.name: Lucky
trait.text: When Quinn rolls a 1 on an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, he can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

trait.name: Brave
trait.text: Quinn have advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

trait.name: Halfling Nimbleness
trait.text: Quinn can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than his.

trait.name: Naturally Stealthy
trait.text: Quinn can attempt to hide even when he is obscured only by a creature that is at least one size larger than him.

action.name: Longsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 5 slashing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Protection
reaction.text: Quinn imposes disadvantage on the attack roll of a creature within 5 feet of him whose target isn’t Quinn. Quinn must be able to see the attacker.

monster.name: Sidekick: Galandro Luna 13
monster.skill: Acrobatics +16, Performance +9, Persuasion +9, Sleight of Hand +10, Stealth +15
monster.languages: Common, plus one of your choice

trait.name: Reliable Talent
trait.text: Whenever the expert makes an ability check that includes its whole proficiency bonus, it can treat a d20 roll of 9 or lower as a 10.

trait.name: Evasion
trait.text: When the expert is not incapacitated and subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it failed.

trait.name: Extra Attack
trait.text: The expert can attack twice, instead of once, whenever it takes the Attack action on its turn.

trait.name: Helpful
trait.text: The expert can take the Help action as a bonus action, and the creature who receives the help gains a 1d6 bonus to the d20 roll. If that roll is an attack roll, the creature can forgo adding the bonus to it, and then if the attack hits, the creature can add the bonus to the attack’s damage roll against one target.

trait.name: Tools
trait.text: The expert has thieves’ tools and a musical instrument.

trait.name: Cunning Action
trait.text: On the expert’s turn in combat, it can take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action as a bonus action.

action.name: Shortsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage.

action.name: Dagger
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d4 + 5) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage.

monster.languages: Common, plus one of your choice

trait.name: Stroke of Luck
trait.text: The expert has an uncanny knack for succeeding when they need to. If their attack misses a target within range, they can turn the miss into a hit. Alternatively, if they fail an ability check, they can treat the d20 roll as a 20.
The expert can use this ability once per day.

trait.name: Helpful
trait.text: Pete can take the Help action as a bonus action, and the creature who receives the help gains a 1d6 bonus to the d20 roll. If that roll is an attack roll, the creature can forgo adding the bonus to it, and then if the attack hits, the creature can add the bonus to the attack’s damage roll against one target.

trait.name: Tools
trait.text: Pete has thieves’ tools and a musical instrument.

trait.name: Cunning Action
trait.text: On Pete’s turn in combat, he can take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action as a bonus action.

action.name: Shortsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage.

action.name: Dagger
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d4 + 5) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage.

monster.name: Sidekick: Pickled Pete 14
monster.skill: Acrobatics +16, Performance +9, Persuasion +9, Sleight of Hand +10, Stealth +15
monster.languages: Common, plus one of your choice

trait.name: Blindsense
trait.text: If Pete is able to hear, he is aware of the location of any hidden or invisible creature within 10 feet of him.

trait.name: Reliable Talent
trait.text: Whenever Pete makes an ability check that includes his whole proficiency bonus, it can treat a d20 roll of 9 or lower as a 10.

trait.name: Evasion
trait.text: When Pete is not incapacitated and subjected to an effect that allows him to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, he instead takes no damage if he succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if he failed.

trait.name: Extra Attack
trait.text: Pete can attack twice, instead of once, whenever it takes the Attack action on his turn.

trait.text: Pete can take the Help action as a bonus action, and the creature who receives the help gains a 1d6 bonus to the d20 roll. trait.name: Stroke of Luck
trait.text: Pete has an uncanny knack for succeeding when they need to. If his attack misses a target within range, he can turn the miss into a hit. Alternatively, if he fail an ability check, he can treat the d20 roll as a 20.
Pete can use this ability once per day.

trait.text: Talon can attack twice, instead of once, whenever it takes the Attack action on his turn.

trait.name: Helpful
trait.text: Talon can take the Help action as a bonus action, and the creature who receives the help gains a 1d6 bonus to the d20 roll. If that roll is an attack roll, the creature can forgo adding the bonus to it, and then if the attack hits, the creature can add the bonus to the attack’s damage roll against one target.

trait.name: Tools
trait.text: Talon has thieves’ tools and a musical instrument.

trait.name: Cunning Action
trait.text: On Talon’s turn in combat, he can take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action as a bonus action.

action.name: Shortsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage.

action.name: Dagger
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d4 + 5) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage.

monster.name: Sidekick: Talon Thornwild 20
monster.skill: Acrobatics +17, Performance +11, Persuasion +11, Sleight of Hand +11, Stealth +17
monster.languages: Common, plus one of your choice

trait.name: Stroke of Luck
trait.text: Talon has an uncanny knack for succeeding when they need to. If his attack misses a target within range, he can turn the miss into a hit. Alternatively, if he fail an ability check, he can treat the d20 roll as a 20.
Talon can use this ability once per day.

trait.name: Elusive
trait.text: Talon is so evasive that attackers rarely gain the upper hand against him. No attack roll has advantage against him while they aren't incapacitated.

trait.name: Blindsense
trait.text: If Talon is able to hear, he is aware of the location of any hidden or invisible creature within 10 feet of him.

trait.name: Reliable Talent
trait.text: Whenever Talon makes an ability check that includes his whole proficiency bonus, it can treat a d20 roll of 9 or lower as a 10.

trait.name: Evasion
trait.text: When Talon is not incapacitated and subjected to an effect that allows him to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, he instead takes no damage if he succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if he failed.

trait.name: Extra Attack
trait.text: Talon can attack twice, instead of once, whenever it takes the Attack action on his turn.

trait.name: Helpful
trait.text: Talon can take the Help action as a bonus action, and the creature who receives the help gains a 1d6 bonus to the d20 roll. If that roll is an attack roll, the creature can forgo adding the bonus to it, and then if the attack hits, the creature can add the bonus to the attack’s damage roll against one target.

trait.name: Tools
trait.text: Talon has thieves’ tools and a musical instrument.

trait.name: Cunning Action
trait.text: On Talon’s turn in combat, he can take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action as a bonus action.

action.name: Shortsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage.

action.name: Dagger
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d4 + 5) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage.

monster.name: Sidekick: Nib Addlespur (Mage) 13
monster.languages: Common, Halfling

trait.name: Lucky
trait.text: When Nib rolls a 1 on an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, she can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

trait.name: Brave
trait.text: Nib have advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

trait.name: Halfling Nimbleness
trait.text: Nib can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than her.

trait.name: Naturally Stealthy
trait.text: Nib can attempt to hide even when she is obscured only by a creature that is at least one size larger than her.

trait.name: Empowered Spells
trait.text: Choose one school of magic. Whenever Nib casts a spell of that school by expending a spell slot, Nib can add its spellcasting ability modifier to the spell’s damage roll or healing roll, if any.

trait.name: Potent Cantrips
trait.text: Nib can add its spellcasting ability modifier to the damage it deals with any cantrip.

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text: Nib’s spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 18, +10 to hit with spell attacks). Nib has following wizard spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, mage hand, minor illusion, shocking grasp
1st level (4 slots): sleep, burning hands, shield
2nd level (3 slots): invisibility, flaming sphere
3rd level (3 slots): fireball, fly
4th level (3 slots): wall of fire, polymorph
5th level (2 slots): cone of cold, hold monster
6th level (1 slot): chain lightning
7th level (1 slot): delayed blast fireball

trait.name: Lucky
trait.text: When Nib rolls a 1 on an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, she can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

trait.name: Brave
trait.text: Nib have advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

trait.name: Halfling Nimbleness
trait.text: Nib can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than her.

trait.name: Naturally Stealthy
trait.text: Nib can attempt to hide even when she is obscured only by a creature that is at least one size larger than her.

trait.name: Overchannel
trait.text: Nib can increase the power of their simpler spells. When Nib casts a spell of 5th level or lower that deals damage or heals, Nib can deal maximum damage/healing with that spell once per day.

trait.name: Empowered Spells
trait.text: Choose one school of magic. Whenever Nib casts a spell of that school by expending a spell slot, Nib can add its spellcasting ability modifier to the spell’s damage roll or healing roll, if any.

trait.name: Potent Cantrips
trait.text: Nib can add its spellcasting ability modifier to the damage it deals with any cantrip.

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text: Nib’s spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 18, +10 to hit with spell attacks). Nib has following cleric spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): guidance, sacred flame, resistance, light, spare the dying
1st level (4 slots): cure wounds, bless, shield of faith
2nd level (3 slots): aid, lesser restoration
3rd level (3 slots): protection from energy, revivify
4th level (3 slots): death ward, banishment
5th level (2 slots): greater restoration, mass cure wounds, dispel evil and good
6th level (1 slot): heal
7th level (1 slot): regenerate
8th level (1 slot): holy aura

action.name: Quarterstaff
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, or 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

monster.name: Sidekick: Shajan Kwan (Mage) 20
monster.languages: Common, plus one of your choice

trait.name: Signature Spell
trait.text: Shajan can choose one 3rd level spell. Shajan can cast this spell once without expending a spell slot.

trait.name: Spell Mastery
trait.text: Shajan has such mastery over certain spells that they can cast them at will. Choose a 1st-level spell and a 2nd-level spell that are Shajan knows. Shajan can cast those spells twice at their lowest level without expending a spell slot.

trait.name: Overchannel
trait.text: Shajan can increase the power of their simpler spells. When Shajan casts a spell of 5th level or lower that deals damage or heals, Shajan can deal maximum damage/healing with that spell once per day.

trait.name: Empowered Spells
trait.text: Choose one school of magic. Whenever Shajan casts a spell of that school by expending a spell slot, Shajan can add its spellcasting ability modifier to the spell’s damage roll or healing roll, if any.

trait.name: Potent Cantrips
trait.text: Shajan can add its spellcasting ability modifier to the damage it deals with any cantrip.

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text: Shajan’s spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 19, +11 to hit with spell attacks). Shajan has following wizard spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, mage hand, minor illusion, shocking grasp
1st level (4 slots): sleep, burning hands, shield
2nd level (3 slots): invisibility, flaming sphere
3rd level (3 slots): fireball, fly
4th level (3 slots): wall of fire, polymorph
5th level (3 slots): cone of cold, hold monster, telekinesis
6th level (2 slots): chain lightning, circle of death, circle of death
7th level (2 slots): delayed blast fireball, finger of death
8th level (1 slot): incendiary cloud, dominate monster
9th level (1 slot): meteor swarm, power word kill
